header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: If you do not remember your login, please contact the site administrator.
trans-unit.target: Ako se ne sjećate da ste se prijavili, molimo obratite se administratoru web stranice.

trans-unit.source: This email is connected with several accounts. Please enter your login.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj e-mail povezan je s nekoliko korisničkih računa. Molimo unesite vaše korisničko ime.

trans-unit.source:
Hi,

We have received a request to reset the password for your account on site. Click “reset password” below to choose a new password:

Reset password

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email, and your password will remain the same.
trans-unit.target:
Pozdrav,

Zaprimili smo zahtjev za ponovnim postavljanjem lozinke za Vaš korisnički račun na web stranici. Kliknite na "Ponovno postavi lozinku" kako biste odabrali novu lozinku:

Ponovno postavi lozinku

Ako niste podnijeli zahtjev za ponovnim postavljanjem lozinke, molimo ignorirajte ovaj email, i Vaša lozinka ostat će nepromijenjena.

trans-unit.source:
We have sent an email to the email address of your account. You should receive the email shortly.

If the email is slow to arrive, check your spam folders.

If you receive no email, it’s that your username or email is unknown to us, so please double check.

If you reset your password multiple times, only the most recent email link will be valid
trans-unit.target:
Poslali smo email na email adresu Vašeg korisničkog računa. Trebali biste uskoro zaprimiti email.

Ukoliko niste zaprimili email kroz duži period vremena, Provjerite svoj spremnik za neželjenu poštu.

Ukoliko niste zaprimili email, vaše korisničko ime ili email nije prepoznat u sustavu, molimo provjerite jeste li upisali ispravnu vrijednost.

Ukoliko ste podnijeli višestruke zahtjeve za promjenom lozinke, samo najnoviji link zaprimjen putem email-a bit će valjan
